name: Fire Giant
description: A towering and muscular humanoid with coal-black skin and glowing red eyes. Clad in heavy armor, it resembles a living volcano.
memorable: Possesses an immunity to fire and a significant ability to wield flames in battle.
goals: To command armies, forge powerful weapons, and conquer territories.
relations: Often commands lesser giants or humanoid slaves.
environment: Lives in volcanic regions or massive forges.
strengths: Exceptionally high physical strength and durability with the ability to control fire and heat.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to cold damage, which slows it down.
attacks: Wields an enormous greatsword for devastating melee strikes and can throw volcanic boulders for ranged attacks.
most_powerful_ability: Can unleash a Volcanic Burst, causing widespread fire damage and knocking targets prone.
equipment: Heavy ornate armor and formidable melee weapons like a greatsword.
senses: Has passive perception of 16, allowing it to detect hidden creatures effectively.
skills: Excels in athletics, intimidation, and has notable perception skills.
additional_information: Can use a 'Sword Sweep' to attack all nearby enemies while bloodied.
Immunity to fire damage enhances its resilience in battle.
Capable of causing significant area-of-effect damage and controlling battlefield positioning.
Possesses a special move that reduces its speed when it takes cold damage.
Can utilize reactions like kicking attackers to create battlefield dynamics.
